attributes.action: Amend the human rights act to exclude those serving custodial sentences from all but the right to life,food, shelter and the absence of physical punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are serving a custodial sentence have put themselves outside of normal society and their human rights should be reduced to a more basic leveli.e food, shelter and freedom from physical abuse. Anything else should be a reward not a right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
